name: Madden NFL 202X
description:
Introducing Madden NFL 2X! Countless years after sports have been cancelled, a new football game is finally here! Experience the world of sports after an eternity of isolation in the Madden Cruiser!

Completely unaffiliated with EA Games or the NFL. Please don't sue us.


Developed by the LOCAL SINGLE PLAYERS:

HItlersaurus Christ - Design, writing, scripting

Stuff3- CG modeling and animation

Additional credits:

Original music provided by ZONE Radio Imaging.

Additional textures, models, and effects provided by various free Unity asset store store packs

Madden theme "borrowed" from the Madden games, composed by Aubrey Hodges
Football man model "borrowed" from Dead Rising 3.
